articles.description: Medvedev, who took the court in Acapulco, Mexico, hours after Novak Djokovic's quarter-final loss meant the Russian would replace him at the top, said it was not easy watching the news.
articles.content:
Russian Daniil Medvedev said he wanted to promote peace around the world after a 'roller-coaster day' when he was confirmed as the world's top tennis player and his country invaded Ukraine.
US Open … [+5233 chars]
